title: Sexual orientation of Americans in 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Sexual Orientations on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Sexual Orientation Straight had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual for Men.
The maximum Share of respondents for Women that was found in Sexual Orientation Straight was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
Averaging all 2 groups Women, and Men, the Sexual Orientation Straight is the maximum Share of respondents and Bisexual is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Sexual Orientations on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents for Sexual Orientation Straight and Men had the lowest Share of respondents for Sexual Orientation Bisexual.

Sexual Orientation Straight had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual for Men.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Sexual Orientations on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
For Sexual Orientation Straight, Men had the highest Share of respondents 978.0 among the 2 groups and in Bisexual, Men had the lowest Share of respondents 4.0.
Among all the Sexual Orientations, Women had the highest Share of respondents 977.0 in Sexual Orientation Straight and lowest value 9.0 in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
The maximum Share of respondents for Women that was found in Sexual Orientation Straight was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
Among the groups, Women had the biggest difference in Share of respondents. Where the maximum Share of respondents was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents.
Averaging all 2 groups Women, and Men, the Sexual Orientation Straight is the maximum Share of respondents and Bisexual is the minimum Share of respondents.
